Integer.MIN_VALUE : Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n            }\n            \n            total = total*10 + digit;\n        }\n        \n        return sign ? -total : total;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
